about_the_game:
Warning, contains major story spoilers: Don't unpack this archive until you beat the game.

This is a small asset package for the game that contains:
3 MP3 tracks of the complete soundtrack to the game.
A collection of background art from the game, upscaled to FullHD (1920x1080) resolution, for use as a system wallpaper. Presented in "clean" and "retro-filter" versions:


Hope you enjoy my soundtrack, and find the BG art useful for your phone/system backgrounds, and as always, thank you for your support!

If you have any issues, requests or questions, feel free to leave a comment over on the Steam Discussions forum, I'll check it as soon as I see it.

name: Meet Her There: OST + BG Pack

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Meet Her There: OST + BG Pack

short_description: An asset pack for the game. Includes 3 tracks that make up the soundtrack, in MP3 format, as well as a collection of upscaled background art from the game, for use as a system wallpaper. Presented in "clean" and in "retro-filter" modes, in FullHD (1920x1080) resolution.
